Hot Wheels: Race Off

Brief:

Experience the thrill of high-velocity racing in Hot Wheels: Race Off, where the iconic toy cars come to life on your mobile device. Navigate through the twists and turns of adrenaline-pumping tracks set in diverse environments. With a collection of vehicles featuring original and classic Hot Wheels designs, this game invites you to perform stunts, race against friends, and prove your driving prowess.
